ygData.subject: RE: Group growth speed bump?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yup - if you have 3 tanks besides you, play it with chant and use your drum for an amazing str/dex and atk speed boost.  If you have only 2 other tanks, prolly
ygData.messageBody:
Yup - if you have 3 tanks besides you, play it with chant and use your drum
for an amazing str/dex and atk speed boost. If you have only 2 other tanks,
prolly still be music bard but if only one other tank, then you are battle
bard.

Sylly

p.s. I count those hi-lev's pets that can dual wield FS weps as tanks too ;p


-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Roach [mailto:mike.roach@...]
Sent: Monday, December 13, 1999 9:31 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Group growth speed bump?

From: Mike Roach <mike.roach@...>

any way?

-Faras
